A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I realized that I was being too hard on this movie. I was judging it based off of my expectations instead of what it actually was. And for that\, I raise my rating an entire one star. I won't say much\, but I realized that I did enjoy this movie and have seen what Rian Johnson envisioned. I love parts of it\, but other parts are bad (Canto Bight). I have nothing to say that you haven't already heard. I liked the movie overall\, but parts of it were bad.
